nodes.text: The fine citizens and businesses of Southern and Southwestern Oregon (Northern Jefferson) should and can have better lives better economics a better future for our children if separated from the Counties in the North
we are often ignored by the representatives to the North
our lives are detrimentally dictated by the governments of the North
our businesses are regulated at the whim of the Northern regulators.
The Oregon's government on Nothern Jefferson is extremely negative for the economy of the country and for the lives of its citizens
The best means to improve the economy and lives is to separate the state from the cause of the depression
Nothern Jefferson citizens aim at improving their economy and lives
